vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
παρεπι-δείκνῡμι,
point out beside or at the same time, [LXX]
__2 display, κακῶς [τὴν τέχνην] [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II middle, display one's ideas, [Refs 1st c.BC+]; also in a depreciatory sense, exhibit out of season, make a display, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: exhibit out of season, make a display
vocabInfos.mediumDef: exhibit out of season, make a display
vocabInfos.stepGloss: exhibit out of season, make a display
